data.comment: The match is underway in Heverlee.
Goal! Kamal Sowah gives Oud-Heverlee a 1-0 lead in Heverlee.
In the minute 43, Oud-Heverlee's Xavier Mercier has been booked in Heverlee.
Nathan Verboomen blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Den Dreef Stadium.
In the minute 50, Franck Kanoute (Cercle Brugge) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Oud-Heverlee extend their lead to 2-0 through Thomas Henry.
Great play from Xavier Mercier to set up the goal.
In the minute 61, Kylian Hazard is replacing Thibo Somers for Cercle Brugge at Den Dreef Stadium.
The away team have replaced Kevin Hoggas with Leonardo da Silva Lopes. This is the second substitution made today by Paul Clement.
Cercle Brugge make their third substitution with Dimitar Velkovski replacing Alexander Corryn.
In the minute 79, Mathieu Maertens (Oud-Heverlee) sees red and is sent off in Heverlee!
At Den Dreef Stadium, David Hubert has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Jeremy Taravel (Cercle Brugge) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 85, Daan Vekemans is on a sub for Xavier Mercier for Oud-Heverlee.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
Ike Ugbo keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-1.
Olivier Myny is replacing Moussa Al-Taamari for the home team.
